M

msafluid - package msafluid
 
MSAFluidSolver2D - Class in msafluid
this is a class for solving real-time fluid dynamics simulations based on Navier-Stokes equations and code from Jos Stam's paper "Real-Time Fluid Dynamics for Games" http://www.dgp.toronto.edu/people/stam/reality/Research/pdf/GDC03.pdf Other useful resources and implementations I looked at while building this lib: Mike Ash (C) - http://mikeash.com/?page=pyblog/fluid-simulation-for-dummies.html Alexander McKenzie (Java) - http://www.multires.caltech.edu/teaching/demos/java/stablefluids.htm Pierluigi Pesenti (AS3 port of Alexander's) - http://blog.oaxoa.com/2008/01/21/actionscript-3-fluids-simulation/ Gustav Taxen (C) - http://www.nada.kth.se/~gustavt/fluids/ Dave Wallin (C++) - http://nuigroup.com/touchlib/ (uses portions from Gustav's)
MSAFluidSolver2D(int, int) - Constructor for class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
Constructor to initialize solver and setup number of cells

R

r - Variable in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
 
randomizeColor() - Method in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
(OPTIONAL SETUP) randomize dye (useful for debugging)
reset() - Method in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
initialize solver (remove all velocities and dye)
rOld - Variable in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
 

S

setDeltaT(float) - Method in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
(OPTIONAL SETUP) set timestep
setFadeSpeed(float) - Method in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
(OPTIONAL SETUP) set how quickly the fluid dye dissipates and fades out
setSolverIterations(int) - Method in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
(OPTIONAL SETUP) set number of iterations for solver (higher is slower but more accurate)
setup(int, int) - Method in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
(OPTIONAL SETUP) re-initialize solver and setup number of cells
setVisc(float) - Method in class msafluid.MSAFluidSolver2D
(OPTIONAL SETUP) set viscosity
